about_the_game:
Get ready to expand your space experience with the exciting DLC "MAYHEM" for Space Battle! This downloadable content pack brings with it a new, more challenging game mode where you will have to defeat as many ships as possible.

  • New wave system.
  • New enemy ships.
  • Changing environment with random asteroid generation.

Important note: By purchasing this DLC, you are first and foremost showing your support for the game and the development team. The extras included in this DLC are our way of thanking you. Your contribution helps us to continue to improve the game and develop exciting future projects - thank you for being part of this adventure!
